full_output.summary: Highly motivated Python developer with experience of building & deploying scalable web applications using Django, Node.js MySQL & DSA proficiency. Proven ability to Enhanced database performance and implemented backend features for optimal application functionality. Eager to leverage skills for a Backend Developer position.

projects.name: EXPENSES TRACKER SYSTEM
projects.description: Empowered users to effortlessly track finances by building a user-friendly budgeting app, eliminating manual entry, and providing real-time insights, resulting in an average 15% monthly savings. Enabled interactive data visualization with real-time updates using Chart.js, resulting in a 40% increase in user engagement. Provided users with immediate insights into their spending habits and financial trends. Predictive Expenses Analysis using machine learning, achieving a 50% reduction in manual entry time, and streamlining the user experience. Built intuitive dashboards with financial insights, resulting in a 50% reduction in user confusion. Guided users towards informed financial decisions and responsible money management, leading to a 20% decrease in overspending. Utilized MySQL database indexing techniques, leading to a 25% improvement in database query performance and ensuring swift data retrieval for users. Leveraged Chart.js library to build high-performance, interactive data visualizations, enhancing user understanding and engagement with real-time data. Designed intuitive financial dashboards, promoting informed decision-making. Contributed to a 20% increase in responsible financial management.

experiences.description: Gained hands-on experience with Node.js, developing several projects including: URL Shortener: Designed and implemented a web application to shorten URLs, improving link management and tracking. Chess Website: Created an interactive chess website, adding features such as sound effects for pawn movements and an intuitive user interface. Chat Website: Developed a real-time chat application, enhancing user communication through instant messaging and notification features. Improved skills in web application development, cloud deployment, and handling various backend services.

full_output.name: Rishiraj Singh Thakur
